summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6147 for the improvement of The Alley in BLOCK 2, FAIRVIEW HOMESTEAD ASSOCIATION ADDITION FOR THE BENEFIT OF MERCHANICS AND LABORERS, being the alley between Fairview Avenue North and Minor Avenue North from John Street to Thomas Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85626, and leving and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
